GET_VERSION: Retrieve the version of the PLM, as well as other PLM info like device category and sub-category.
SEND_STD_MSG: A standard message controls insteon devices, making then turn on, off, and so on.
SPRINKLER_BIRCH_ON: Turn on the sprinkler in the birch tree stand at front of house
SPRINKLER_BIRCH_OFF: Turn off the sprinkler in the birch tree stand at front of house
SPRINKLER_CIRCUMPORCH_ON: Turn on the sprinkler around the porch
SPRINKLER_CIRCUMPORCH_OFF: Turn off the sprinkler around the porch
SPRINKLER_BOARDWALK_ON: Turn on the sprinkler along Boardwalk street
SPRINKLER_BOARDWALK_OFF: Turn off the sprinkler along Boardwalk street
SPRINKLER_FRONTYARD_ON: Turn on the sprinkler for the front yard
SPRINKLER_FRONTYARD_OFF: Turn off the sprinkler for the front yard
SPRINKLER_ND_ON: Turn on the sprinkler for the strip on Northern Dancer
SPRINKLER_ND_OFF: Turn off the sprinkler for the strip on Northern Dancer
